dataList.content: Walpurgis Night Target Extractions will be available during the event period.
Walpurgis Night Target Extractions will have higher Extraction rates for Identities and E.G.O from the currently active Walpurgis Night event.
Tidal Elegy Ishmael can only be obtained as a [Pilgrimage of Compassion Event Reward]; it cannot be obtained via Extraction, Dispenser, or Yisang Exchange.

※ E.G.O, once Extracted, are removed from the Extraction pool. This means that once an E.G.O is obtained, it cannot be Extracted again.
(In Yisang Exchange, already-obtained E.G.O will be labeled “Owned”, and cannot be exchanged for.)
During the event period, Identities & E.G.O from the current Walpurgis Night event will be Extractable from other Extraction banners(save for Season relevant Extraction banners) as well.
However, their extraction rates will be identical to those of other Identities & E.G.O.
Once the event period is over, Walpurgis Night Identities and E.G.O will no longer be Extractable.

During the event period, previous Walpurgis Night Identities & E.G.O will be Extractable from all Extraction banners(save for Season relevant Extraction banners). However, they will not receive increased rates for those Extractions.
